title: Something Spooky
description: Bedtime stories for kids, written by kids. From mysterious visitors to moonlit walks in the woods, spooky stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
itunes:subtitle: A selection of spooky stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
itunes:summary: Bedtime stories for kids, written by kids. From mysterious visitors to moonlit walks in the woods, spooky stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
